issue.message: Expecting `android:banner` with the `<application>` tag or each Leanback launcher activity

Must be one of: Service.START_STICKY_COMPATIBILITY, Service.START_STICKY, Service.START_NOT_STICKY, Service.START_REDELIVER_INTENT

Overriding `@dimen/m3_sys_motion_easing_emphasized_accelerate_control_x1` which is marked as private in com.google.android.material:material:1.14.0-alpha09. If deliberate, use tools:override="true", otherwise pick a different name.

Overriding `@dimen/m3_sys_motion_easing_emphasized_accelerate_control_x2` which is marked as private in com.google.android.material:material:1.14.0-alpha09. If deliberate, use tools:override="true", otherwise pick a different name.
